title: Stock futures slip in early morning trading after tech-led rally - CNBC
content:
1. Stock futures slip in early morning trading after tech-led rally  CNBC
  2. Tech, megacap growth shares boost Wall St; Twitter surges  Reuters.com
  3. Twitter Shares Rise 27%, Leading Market Rally for Tech Stocks  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Tech leads gains on Wall Street, powered by Twitter  Al Jazeera English
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The early morning action followed a Monday tech-led rally that saw the Nasdaq Composite rise 1.9%.
